messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elissa Cleaveland
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Mary! Where in Rochester?? We live in Sea Breeze:) We moved here about 2yrs ago... Tamara - unschooling SAHM to 3 boys:)
messages.messageBody:
Hi Mary!

Where in Rochester??

We live in Sea Breeze:) We moved here about 2yrs ago...

Tamara - unschooling SAHM to 3 boys:)

> Hi,
> Where in NY are you? We're unschooers in Rochester.
> Mary

messages.subject: Re: Elissa Cleaveland
messages.msgSnippet: ... east of ... I have homeschooling friends that just moved to Camden!  They are not unschoolers, but they are really nice people. Joanna
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., <ElissaJC@c...> wrote:
> Hi Mary in Rochester!
> Our family is going next week to look at a place in Camden - Oneida
> County.It's not nearly as upstate as Rochester. About 40 minutes
east of
> Syracuse.
> We are currently in Maryland.
> ~Elissa Cleaveland

I have homeschooling friends that just moved to Camden! They are not
unschoolers, but they are really nice people.
Joanna

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elissa Cleaveland
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, It s a small world.  My bil and sil live with their 2dds in the Baltimore area. Mary-NY ...
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
It's a small world. My bil and sil live with their 2dds in the Baltimore
area.
Mary-NY

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elissa Cleaveland
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Mary in Rochester! Our family is going next week to look at a place in Camden - Oneida County.It s not nearly as upstate as Rochester. About 40 minutes east
messages.messageBody:
Hi Mary in Rochester!
Our family is going next week to look at a place in Camden - Oneida
County.It's not nearly as upstate as Rochester. About 40 minutes east of
Syracuse.
We are currently in Maryland.
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: Elissa Cleaveland
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Where in NY are you?  We re unschooers in Rochester. Mary ... _________________________________________________________________ MSN Photos is the easiest
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Where in NY are you? We're unschooers in Rochester.
Mary


>From: <ElissaJC@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] conversation starter
>Date: Mon, 11 Mar 2002 10:29:32 -0500
>
>That sounds like a really fun life. Your post made me giggle (well,
>chuckle,
>I'm not really a giggle type) to the end.
>Emily and Max have been going up to teh CSA farm with me, I've taken on the
>project of starting herbs from seed, in order to learn more about seed
>starting for when we move to our homestead.
>Max is very into star wars, I have started getting VERY interested in Star
>Trek: TNG, love the pseudo-science! I would like to take max to a science
>fiction/star wars/star trek convention. Any one have ideas?
>Emily and I have been focused on building her socila life. Not that it is
>really lacking there are just some kids that she is intent on getting to
>know better. Our unschooling community is really growing. That is the worst
>thing about moving out of the area, leaving my tribe. BUT, I'll just make a
>new one! There's unschoolers in NYstate!
>~Elissa Cleaveland
>"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
>have
>not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
>
>
>
